days.title: Day 1 - Beginning of October
lines: A new month, a new reason to smile. 💖
Every sunrise reminds me of you.

days.title: Day 2 - Your Smile
lines: Your smile is my favorite view. 😍
Can't wait to see it again.

days.title: Day 3 - Sweet Memory
lines: Every day with you is special. 💕

days.title: Day 4 - Coffee Day
lines: Remember our first coffee? ☕
It still warms my heart.

days.title: Day 5 - Laughter
lines: Your laugh = my favorite sound. 💫

days.title: Day 6 - Cute Chaos
lines: Even chaos feels peaceful with you. ❤️

days.title: Day 7 - Week One Done
lines: One week of smiles down, more to go! 🌷

days.title: Day 8 - Evening Breeze
lines: The breeze feels softer when I think of you. 🌬️

days.title: Day 9 - Our Moments
lines: Every memory with you feels like a movie. 🎞️

days.title: Day 10 - Midway Magic
lines: Halfway to your day! 💝
You deserve the world.

days.title: Day 11 - Little Things
lines: It’s the little things about you that stay forever.

days.title: Day 12 - Heartbeat
lines: My favorite rhythm is your heartbeat. ❤️

days.title: Day 13 - Movie Night
lines: If life’s a movie, you’re my favorite scene. 🎬

days.title: Day 14 - Stars
lines: You outshine the stars, every single night. ✨

days.title: Day 15 - Hugs
lines: Your hugs feel like home. 🏡

days.title: Day 16 - Peace
lines: You’re my calm in every storm. 🌧️

days.title: Day 17 - Music
lines: Every song reminds me of you. 🎶

days.title: Day 18 - Gratitude
lines: Thankful for you, every day. 🙏

days.title: Day 19 - Adventure
lines: Every adventure feels better with you. 🗺️

days.title: Day 20 - Midnight Talks
lines: Those late-night talks = pure magic. 🌙

days.title: Day 21 - Dreaming
lines: Dreaming of you is my favorite thing. 💭

days.title: Day 22 - Warmth
lines: Your warmth melts all my worries. ☀️

days.title: Day 23 - Glow
lines: You glow different. 🌸

days.title: Day 24 - Countdown
lines: Only two days to go! 🥹

days.title: Day 25 - Tomorrow
lines: Tomorrow is your day, my love. 🎂

days.title: Day 26 - Happy Birthday!
lines: Happy Birthday Minnu (Nemo)! 💖
You are my world, my forever, my reason to smile.
